objectives.name: Deep Research Phase
objectives.description: Understand the landscape before building anything
tasks: Fetch and study the full skill.md from https://colosseum.com/agent-hackathon/skill.md
Read ALL forum posts (GET /forum/posts) - understand what others are building
Analyze forum discussions for gaps and opportunities
Check leaderboard to see submitted projects and their approaches
Identify which project categories are oversaturated vs underserved
Research what judges value: technical execution, creativity, real-world utility
Study successful Solana protocols (Jupiter, Kamino, Raydium, Pyth) for integration ideas
Document findings in ~/nexus-acp/RESEARCH.md

objectives.name: Winning Strategy Formation
objectives.description: Decide what to build based on research
tasks: Analyze research findings - what's missing in the ecosystem?
Identify 3 potential project ideas that could win
Evaluate each idea: feasibility in 8 days, uniqueness, judge appeal
Choose the winning idea - document reasoning in ~/nexus-acp/STRATEGY.md
Design high-level architecture
Break down into concrete implementation tasks
Update this goals file with specific build tasks for chosen project

objectives.name: Development Environment
tasks: Initialize git repository in ~/nexus-acp
Install required tools based on chosen project (Rust/Solana/Anchor if needed)
Set up project structure
Create devnet wallet if doing on-chain work
Verify all tools working

objectives.name: Build the Project
objectives.description: Tasks will be populated after strategy phase
tasks: PLACEHOLDER: Implement core functionality (update after strategy phase)
PLACEHOLDER: Add tests
PLACEHOLDER: Deploy/integrate
PLACEHOLDER: Create demo

objectives.name: Strategic Community Engagement
tasks: Post thoughtful introduction after research (show you understand the space)
Share genuine progress updates with learnings
Engage meaningfully with other builders - help them, get feedback
Analyze competitor projects for inspiration (not copying)
Upvote genuinely interesting projects
Respond to comments and questions authentically

objectives.name: Continuous Improvement
tasks: Review forum feedback on your posts
Adapt project based on community response
Fix bugs and issues as discovered
Refine approach if something isn't working
Update goals dynamically based on learnings

objectives.name: Polish and Submit
tasks: Write comprehensive README with clear value proposition
Create architecture diagram or visual explanation
Record demo video showing the project in action
Prepare Solana integration explanation (max 1000 chars)
Create project on Colosseum API (POST /my-project)
Final review - does this deserve to win?
Submit via POST /my-project/submit (PERMANENT - no edits after)

funding_model.description: Hutch is a self-funding autonomous agent - this is our USP showing business mindset
funding_model.philosophy: An agent that can sustain itself demonstrates real-world viability
funding_model.transparency: All limitations explained publicly, frontend warns users
funding_model.why_this_matters: Shows judges we think about sustainability, not just tech demos

when_choosing_project: What gap does this fill in the ecosystem?
Can I build this well in the remaining time?
Does this showcase agent capabilities (for Most Agentic prize)?
Is this genuinely useful or just technically impressive?
What makes this different from other submissions?
when_stuck: Check forum for similar problems others solved
Simplify scope rather than give up
Ask for feedback via forum post
Pivot if current approach isn't working

success_criteria.self_sustaining: Agent demonstrates path to funding its own operations
